title: Beautiful Hyde Park 1 Bedroom (Steps from the Point)
posting_body: I’ve lived in this beautiful apartment for two years.
It is a perfect place for graduate students, undergraduates, or anyone who is looking for a quiet huge apartment.
I love living here and it is only moving and wanting to downsize that is leading me to step away.
I am flexible on lease date: ideally someone who can move in  by September 1 would be ideal.
It is on the third floor and very quiet.
By far one of the nicest places I’ve lived in Chicago in over 10 years.
It’s a two minute walk from the beach, and while it is furnished, I’m happy to leave any furniture that you want.
Rent does not include Wi-Fi or utilities, but it is pretty economical on that front.
My lease is up next July: I would get your name on the lease.
